programme.title: 127 Hours
programme.desc: When adrenaline junkie Aaron Ralston sets off to conquer a canyon in the stunning landscape of a Utah national park, he has no idea quite how bad a day hes in for. When he gets his arm stuck under a rock, hes on his own. During the 127 hours hes pinned to the canyon wall, Ralston weighs his options, and, finally, summons the sheer grit and force of will needed to commit the act that could give him a slim chance of survival.

programme.desc: With family-sized helpings of Matthew Bournes trademark wit, pathos and magical fantasy, Nutcracker! follows Claras bittersweet journey from a darkly comic Christmas Eve at Dr Drosss Orphanage through a shimmering, ice-skating winter wonderland to the scrumptious candy kingdom of Sweetieland, influenced by the lavish Hollywood musicals of the 1930s.

programme.title: Earths Seasonal Secrets
programme.desc: Autumn is the time of year that brings the worlds most spectacular transformations. With winter fast approaching, life has to get ready and that means feeding up while you can, fighting for the last chance to breed and rushing to grow up before the cold returns. While chipmunks and beavers dash to stash their winter supplies, many animals from musk oxen to beetles have to battle for mates and young gannets must face lifes first dangerous challenges.

programme.title: Stonehenge: The Lost Circle Revealed
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts follows a decade-long historical quest to reveal a hidden secret of the famous bluestones of Stonehenge. Using cutting-edge research, a team of archaeologists led by Prof Mike Parker Pearson have painstaking compiled evidence.

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson hosts as Frank Muir, Joanna Lumley and Russell Harty take on Patrick Campbell, Nanette Newman and Bryan Forbes in the panel game of word definitions and deceptions.

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper hosts the 100th edition of the musical quiz. He is joined by Judith Jackson, Robin Ray and Richard Baker. The guest musician is Ian Wallace.

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: A documentary that follows three decades of Soviet space culture, from the glory days of Yuri Gagarin to the saga of Sergei Krikalev, the Soviet citizen who was suspended in space for ten months as the Soviet Union was dismantled.

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: Documentary about the tube, the worlds oldest underground system. Three million passengers use it every day, and over the past 150 years, it has developed its own history, alongside literature, music and film that have been inspired by it. Includes contributions from the London undergrounds staff.

And in the advice clinic, there is expert help for one viewer who fears their precious jewellery has a manufacturing fault.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: All three property renovations today are led by family partnerships - a husband, wife and daughter team in Madeley, brothers-in-law in Castleton and an entire family in Newton Aycliffe get stuck in. programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Hop on board this episode of Bargain Hunt from Derbyshire as Natasha Raskin Sharp learns how trams once helped to deliver the mail. At the cost of a penny, passengers could post a letter in a box next to the driver, which would then be delivered by parcel boys. Can the teams deliver a profit of their own when they shop for antiques and collectibles in the town of Heanor? Danny Sebastian captains the red team, married couple Tom and Karen, as they hunt for a cat-related item.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: After a three-minute video featuring a female prison officer and an inmate having sex inside HMP Wandsworth goes viral, award-winning journalist Mobeen Azhar begins an investigation into what happened and why. A year of twists, turns and damning revelations pulls back the curtain on a dangerous wider world of coercion, corruption and contraband thriving behind bars.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: As Mobeens investigation deepens, it becomes clearer that illicit relationships between prisoners and jail staff are just the tip of the iceberg. The bigger story involves organised criminal gangs determined to cash in on a lucrative prison drug economy. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Suzy, Ed, Gemma and Arun battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia

programme.title: The Game Catchers

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Izaac is making a traditional recipe from his home county of Lancashire. The Chorley cakes are made from circles of pastry filled with a fruity filling of dried cherries and currants. Izaac works hard tickling the flour and butter together before turning it into dough, which he then has to carefully roll out. When Izaacs friends arrive he gives them a red rose, the symbol of Lancashire. Will Izaacs friends guess the special ingredient and will they enjoy it in his Chorley cakes?

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures

programme.desc: Ray leaves Debra at home after becoming fed up with her perpetual lateness.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray hits the roof when he finds out that Ally has to wear a $250 dress to attend her best friends 13th birthday.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: After Robert takes a second job selling home security systems, he reveals hes been asked to join the firm full-time and is mulling over retiring from the police force early.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Jennifer makes a startling revelation on her one-month anniversary with Charlie; Paul tries to keep money from his ex-wife.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Caitlins mother visits and pressures her to marry; a childhood friend who is also a supermodel invites Paul and a guest to a fashion show.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mayor Winstons opponent drops from the race after a heart attack; Charlie is punched by Caitlins new boyfriend.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mayor Winston has a surprise on election day; Charlie and Jennifer consider the future of their own relationship.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fertility Test
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler have an embarrassing encounter with an old acquaintance at a fertility clinic, Ross plays Cyrano to help Joey woo a professor, and Rachel sneaks into a spa for a massage hoping Phoebe wont find out.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Disappointed to learn that they cannot conceive a baby naturally, Monica and Chandler consider their options. When Chandler invites a handsome colleague round for dinner, Monica and Chandler embarrassingly interview him as a potential sperm donor. Meanwhile, while shopping with Phoebe, Rachel admits that she still has a thing for Joey.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang heads to Barbados for a palaeontology convention where Ross is the keynote speaker. Rachel harbours steamy thoughts about Joey while David prepares to propose to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss
programme.desc: While the friends are still in Barbados, Joey tries to tell Ross about his feelings for Rachel and Ross wants to confess to kissing Joeys girlfriend Charlie, but it is easier said than done. Meanwhile, Monica, Chandler and Phoebe can hear their amorous conversations through the hotels paper-thin walls. Also, Monicas hair problems go from bad to worse, and Phoebe has some bad news for Mikes girlfriend on her birthday.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
programme.desc: Ross drinks too much wine while dining with Rachel, Joey and Charlie. Elsewhere, Frank Jr cannot cope with his precocious triplets and pays Phoebe a visit.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Joey nervously anticipate their first real date, Monica and Phoebe try to avoid an obnoxious friend with a fake British accent, and Ross emerges from a tanning booth with a two-toned appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel gets Monica and Chandler to delay their long-awaited trip to Vermont for Emmas first birthday bash, but problems ensue when Emma falls asleep and a racy cake turns up.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachels Sister Baby-Sits
programme.desc: Rachel regrets trusting her self-indulgent little sister Amy with Emma, Monica regrets asking Joey to write a recommendation letter to the child adoption agency for her, and Phoebe accidentally thwarts the anniversary surprise Mike has in store for her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross applies for a palaeontology grant, but discovers that Dr Hobart - who allocates such funding - used to go out with his girlfriend Charlie. Meanwhile, Mike wants Phoebe to get rid of one of her bizarre paintings, but neither Rachel nor Monica is keen to take it, and Chandler lies to Joey about watching his audition tape.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Home Study
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fuss over their apartment as they expect a visit from the adoption worker. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Mike opt for a small wedding and donate the extra money to a childrens charity.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Late Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Monica reluctantly agrees to cook Thanksgiving dinner, but locks everyone out when they turn up late as Joey and Ross went to a hockey game while Rachel and Phoebe took Emma to a baby beauty contest. Monica also receives some adoption news.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Birth Mother
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler are forced to pretend to be a reverend and a doctor when their prospective childs birth mother gets the wrong end of the stick. Meanwhile, Joeys date with Phoebes friend doesnt go well, and Ross is left with an inappropriate outfit for a date with a sexy salesgirl.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
programme.desc: Phoebe and Rachel see Chandler getting into a car with a mystery woman and follow them to a large house in the suburbs. They tell Monica of their fears and are shocked by the truth.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Stripper Cries
programme.desc: Joey appears as a celebrity contestant on `The $100,000 Pyramid with its actual host Donny Osmond, but Joeys dubious IQ costs his partner the prize money. Meanwhile, Monica and Rachel hire an ungainly stripper, Roy - without seeing him first - for Phoebes bachelorette party. Also, Chandler and Ross attend a college reunion and meet an attractive woman they both promised not to date during school.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: Hotel Hell and Kitchen Sink Drama
programme.desc: ...A******? Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix are back with more potential A******s for your consideration. Meet a man who dumped his mum on holiday and someone with a rather dubious ick.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Following a rocky start in Red River Gorge, Barneys got another activity in store - a paranormal one, at the haunted Poasttown Elementary School. The next day, the Walshes wake up in Louisville, the home of Muhammad Ali. There they follow in the footsteps of `The Champ, sparring down at a local boxing ring to work up an appetite. Barney rewards his dad with a well-earned KFC.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: In Ohio, Brad and Barney head straight for Dayton, the home of aviation. After recreating history in the Wright B Flyer, its Barneys turn to take the wheel - of a plane. The Walshes attend a local rodeo, and Brads quick to realise theyre not just there to spectate: theyll be taking part in `the most dangerous eight seconds in sport. However, after a nasty fall from an angry bull, Brad ends up spending the night in hospital, giving `Breaking Dad a whole new meaning.

programme.title: Ed Byrne: Spoiler Alert
programme.desc: `Mock the Week star and Munro bagger Ed Byrne performs his Edinburgh Fringe sell-out stand-up show Spoiler Alert at Glasgows Tramway. In the show, Ed explores the thin line between righteous complaining and brat-like whining and asks, `are we right to be fed up, or are we spoiled? Ed is always happy to perform in Glasgow, where he took his fledgling comedy steps while at university.

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: Tony and Jim clash over the best way to tackle high level company tax fraud. Keen to launch a major Govt report, Rhonda seeks help from a well-known television personality. (S4, E01)

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: The arrival of a work experience student leads to unexpected Ministerial developments. Nat is invited to join a prestigious board but soon clashes with the Chair. (S4, E02)

programme.desc: Demetri focuses his attention on `control and performs sketches on court orders, secret agents and bad flatmates.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek Bieri takes old cars from non-running derelicts to renovated transformations. He seeks out abandoned cars where they lie dormant and gets them running again, explaining why they are still relevant.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek heads to Minnesota to revive a dirt track car hes had stashed away for years. It was a legend in its heyday, but with the car currently in pieces, hell need the help of some skilled friends if hes going to bring his vision back to life.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: When the Time Bandit loses power with a storm at its tail, Johnathan deploys a camera probe to find whats snarling his propeller. Keith sets a decoy string to lure Sig away from good fishing, but risks his own secret plan by trusting the wrong ally.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: In the winter premiere, the snow crab fishery reopens unexpectedly after three years -- and Keith and Jake charge north, only to collide with an incoming Siberian storm.

programme.title: Moonshiners
programme.desc: After discovering a strange barrel of mash, Mark and Digger scramble to reproduce a game-changing liquor run. Tickle and the Laws employ an old moonshiner tactic as cold weather stalls their apple brandy mash. Mike and Jerry rebuild after a flood.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys are in Maine to help a couple whose homestead is overrun with boglands; they build structures to help with the brutal winters.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer and Ant Anstead work together to give new life to run-down classic automobiles to resell them at a profit. Working on a tight budget, Mike must find a vehicle for Ant to fix, but that isnt always the easiest task.

programme.title: Combat Dealers
programme.desc: A Russian client is looking for artefacts from the fall of Berlin. Bruce sees an opportunity to offload a German 88mm anti-tank weapon that was used in the battle.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Marty re-rescues the Broadhead family, whose Ohio home was made from 30,000 tires and faces major new structural issues. Taking on a big challenge with limited time, Marty must restore a settling berm and construct a concrete storm.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Mazda RX7 is an 80s classic loved on both sides of the Atlantic. Mike finds a desirable 1985 MK1 with dodgy aftermarket add-ons and a dubious rotary engine.

programme.title: Combat Dealers
programme.desc: Bruce hears about some second world war British airborne division gear from the battle of Arnhem for sale, which is of big interest to ex-paratroopers like him and Freddie.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: In the logging world, big wood equals big money; its a tough job for the crews logging and transporting the big and valuable timber.

programme.desc: Josh dives into the Lajas Reef off Panamas coast in search of treasure chests on the sunken flagship of legendary pirate Captain Morgan. His journey takes him to Panama City and he visits the Panama Canal, a modern marvel.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

Pamela Lamb from Devon cherishes this memento, as it belonged to her elder sister Vera, who sadly passed away as a teenager. Pamela still remembers happy times when they would play with the box, but the fire scarred the pretty painted box.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Keith Kear from Epping Forest has a junior drum kit for musical instrument expert Pete Woods to work on. The 1920s drums were originally his fathers, and then a young Keith played them to his hearts content. Keiths sons were the next to enjoy them, but all that banging by enthusiastic young drummers has left them worse for wear.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: At Woking recycling centre in Surrey, upcycler extraordinaire Sarah Moore is on the lookout for three unloved items that she can save and sell on for a profit. To help transform her trio of skip-finds, Sarah turns to upholsterer Simion Hawtin-Smith to give a little green chair a new lease of life, while furniture restorer Katie Keat has a dated display cabinet to contend with. For her own project, Sarah tries to turn a profit on a pair of school chairs.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Following two people haunted by events of the past. One woman whose memory of a week spent with her younger brother 50 years ago is driving her to find him, and a man who cannot shake the question concerning a mother giving up her child.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Veteran road tripper James Braxton tours the south east with youthful novice Izzie Balmer, an auctioneer with a penchant for jewellery. Elsewhere, James gets waylaid by a heady brew of beer and witchcraft.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: The sunny Izzie Balmer tours Northamptonshire and Bedfordshire with her self-confessed curmudgeonly counterpart, James Braxton. However, Izzies cakes soon have him eating out of her hand.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team help celebrities clear their homes of clutter. They look for hidden gems to be auctioned off for profit.

programme.title: Johnny Vegas Little Shop of Antiques
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Johnny Vegas embarks on a new adventure: opening an antiques shop in Lancashire. Can he turn his ramshackle dream into a business?

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team set to work restoring a precious sitar, a Second World War pilots jacket and a toy bird that has lost its tweet.

programme.title: Help! My House is Haunted
programme.desc: Lucy inherited her fathers property and hopes to give it to son Ben. But neither of them can step foot inside after experiencing inexplicable horror.

programme.title: Help! My House is Haunted
programme.desc: Emma is harassed by spirits. One sinister spirit is Shadow Man, and he wont give her up without a fight, so Ian takes extreme measures to save her.

programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: When two cops witness an assassination attempt, a ruthless crime boss orders Gabriel Tancredi, an ex-Marine turned mob enforcer, to eliminate any and all threats.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: Ace assassin Arthur Bishop becomes a target when he agrees to teach reckless Steve the art of contract killing.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: To the court of the King of Qin, who seeks to rule the united country, comes Nameless, who claims to have killed three deadly assassins who were all determined to kill the King. As Nameless recounts his exploits in flashback, each time the wily King responds with his version. Is Nameless a true servant of Qin or does he have a secret agenda?

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: Tongue-in-cheek tale about a high-speed car chase across America involving a sheriff and a bootlegger with crash stunts galore. All goes well for the Bandit as he drives from Texas to Georgia with a truckload of illicit beer until he stops to pick up a damsel in distress, who also happens to be the sheriffs daughter.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he goes on location to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day. His predicament drives him to distraction, until he sees a way of turning the situation to his advantage.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: After discovering that he can travel through time, a young man uses his ability to win the woman of his dreams and save his friend from professional disaster.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: Michael Oher is a poor and undereducated African-American teenager who lived all his life on the streets. His tremendous size and quickness makes him a perfect athlete and attracts the interest if a wealthy and conservative suburban family who take him in and groom him both athletically and academically.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Old rivalries and new adversaries await Daniel and Miyagi as they travel to Okinawa to visit Miyagis ailing father.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A high school senior befriends a strange subterranean creature after building a monster truck from bits and pieces of scrapped cars.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: When a lonely young boy begins reading books from a strange bookshop in the back streets of his home town, he is transported to the magical kingdom of Fantasia, which is created by the dreams and imagination of people on Earth, but the land is in danger, and Bastian must find a way to help the Fantasian hero, Atreyu, save his world.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: A boy trained in the martial arts is alienated from his mentor just when he needs to prepare for a showdown with his arch-enemy. Instead, he turns to a Vietnam vet who teaches him how to fight dirty - a strategy the youth comes to realise is a mistake.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles spring into action to battle Shredder, mad scientist Baxter Stockman, Bebop, Rocksteady and the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles spring into action to battle Shredder, mad scientist Baxter Stockman, Bebop, Rocksteady and the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: An American footballer is given the body of a wealthy industrialist after an inept angel prematurely claims his life.

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Its the hottest day of the year and when Italian-American Sal refuses to make changes to his pizza parlour in the predominantly black community, tension and tempers mount.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel.

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A rebellious teen vents his anger with the Mods and the Rockers in 1964 London. Based on the album by the Who.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: When a familys pet cat is called, they manage to resurrect the animal by placing it in an Indian burial ground which, it is believed, can revive the dead, although in doing so they create a monster.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: In stifling Edwardian London, Wendy Darling mesmerises her brothers every night with bedtime tales of swordplay, swashbuckling and the fearsome Captain Hook. However, the children become the heroes of an even greater story, when Peter Pan flies into their nursery one night and leads them over moonlit rooftops through a galaxy of stars and to the lush jungles of Neverland.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A teen and his new stepfather find an island of secrets, strange life forms and gold after they answer a coded distress signal.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Ramona becomes crippled by grief after the death of her husband, leaving her to care for her two children alone in her farmhouse. Her sadness soon turns to fear when a spectral woman in black appears on her front lawn, warning her "todays the day."

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Years Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives when Y2K becomes a reality.

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: Stuck in a bizarre relationship with her dead, wisecracking Army pal, a veteran reunites with her solitary grandfather at his lake house.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: A disposable employee is sent on a human expedition to colonize the ice world Niflheim. After one iteration dies, a new body is regenerated with most of his memories intact.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in a desperate attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his marriage. Covering as his marriage counselor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A television executive searching for the ultimate show for his sex-based network comes across `Videodrome, a pirate broadcast of what appears to be pornographic snuff films. Trying to track down the makers, he enters a world of extreme sex and violence in one of David Cronenbergs early films that, while explicit, also satirises the media industry and its attempts at mind-control.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: A tech blogger unleashes the power of a time-altering device to rewrite the past and seek revenge against the ruthless corporate empire that destroyed his family.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dual
programme.desc: Upon receiving a terminal diagnosis, Sarah opts for a cloning procedure to ease her loss on her friends and family. When she makes a miraculous recovery, her attempts to decommission her clone fail, leading to a court-mandated duel to the death.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice continues her journey to find survivors after the world is hit by a virus infection which turns its victims in the Undead. With help from an old friend, Alice leads the survivors to Los Angeles, which she believes is a safe haven. However, its all a trap set up by the Umbrella Corporation, who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Strange Darling
programme.desc: Nothing is what it seems when a twisted one-night stand spirals into a serial killers vicious murder spree.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Heart Eyes
programme.desc: A masked maniac with glowing, red eyes returns every Valentines Day to slaughter unsuspecting couples. When a cynical ad executive and her hopelessly romantic colleague become the next target, they decide to fight back and end the reign of terror.

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: Tale about a familys snowy day. Dad is a TV weatherman who tries vainly to get people to listen to his predictions, Mum is a stressed businesswoman without childcare for her toddler, and their eldest son is obsessed by the prettiest girl in the school. However, school is closed and his ten-year-old sister decides to sabotage the snowplough and extend the fun for another day.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. programme.title: Sharp Corner

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise theyre at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Nigel offers to look after Herberts precious watermelon crop on ripening day.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Doris Precious Things
programme.desc: Doris is determined to build the biggest collection of interesting things in Africa, but she upsets the other animals when she takes things that they need.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Leopoldo the Llama
programme.desc: Leopoldo is fed up at always having to play everybody elses choice of games. He decides to climb a mountain on his own as nobody else wants to come with him. Everyone soon realised that perhaps it is more fun doing things with your friends after all.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Zed The Hero of Africa
programme.desc: The volcano is threatening to erupt but the animals are reluctant to leave their beautiful savannah home. Can anybody come to the rescue?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the End of the Rainy Season
programme.desc: It is the end of the rainy season and Patsy the porcupine will soon be arriving to tidy up the savannah. The animals are busy having a clearout, except for Herbert the warthog who cannot bring himself to throw anything away. When he cannot find his musical rocks for the concert that night he is encouraged by Doris the duck to have a clearout.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Flamingo Festival
programme.desc: Pauline the pelican is looking forward to the Flamingo Festival on Waterlily Lake and excited to hear that Isobel is this years Flamingo Queen. She loves to watch the flamingoes practising their dance, and secretly copies their moves. When Isobel hurts herself, everybody is worried that the Flamingo Festival will have to be cancelled. That is, until a surprising understudy steps in to take Isobels place.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Whale Trip
programme.desc: The puffins of Mossy Bay are excited to be going on a whale trip with Hercule Moustache. Hercule points out all manner of sights and sounds as they ride on Thelma the whale, but the boisterous puffins dont always listen to Hercule, and frequently interrupt the poor walrus. The puffins soon learn how important it is to listen to your elders when out on a trip.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jimjameree Tree
programme.desc: Joey the kangaroo and his friends all love to play by the jimjamaree tree. They are devastated when the tree is struck by lightning in a big storm. Together with Wally Two Trees they do everything they can to ensure their favourite tree comes back to life, with magical results.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Joey the kangaroo and his friend love playing boomerang ball together. However when their mums fall out they are no longer allowed to play with each other. Can the friends work together to reconcile their mums so that they can play again?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Zeds Really Helpful Mood
programme.desc: Zed the zebra decides to help all of his friends on the savannah. However, he does not always listen to them, and tries to help them in the way that he sees fit. Unfortunately, he ends up being more of a hindrance than a help.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo is in the Scottish Highlands on the last leg of his rail journey through 1930s Britain. He begins in Elgins port, the coastal town of Lossiemouth, where James Ramsay MacDonald, the Labour Partys first Prime Minister was born. Michael meets his granddaughter to visit the family home and discovers what shaped his politics. On the outskirts of Lossiemouth, Michael finds a remote boarding school established in the 1930s.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo boards the Great Western Railway at the Cornish seaside resort of St Ives. In Britains first studio pottery, he attempts a decorative wax technique and feels the heat of the firing kiln. He discovers a Cornish fisherman, who,although he began painting only in his seventies, inspired established artists from the capital.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo is in Cornwalls county town, Truro, with his 1930s Bradshaws Guide. In the surrounding countryside, he finds the historic estate of Trewithen, whose gardens were stocked from China by professional plant hunters commissioned by its owner. The Atlantic Coast branch line carries Michael north to Newquay.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Clutching his 1930s Bradshaws Guide, Michael Portillo reaches Bodmin en route to Totnes as he explores the West Country from St Ives to Salisbury Plain. Out on the rugged moor, Michael hears how the celebrated author, Daphne du Maurier, captivated readers between the wars with her tales of smuggling at the Jamaica Inn.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Scotland in the mother of all rainstorms to pick up a Jaguar E-type and a rare MGC convertible. Plus, Dave extracts a rare Austin Gipsey from a lock up.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Theres a surprise waiting for Derek in Hull - a MGSA sports car that once had a tree growing through it. Plus, in North Wales, Alan Holmes is selling his sons Ford Escort RS 1600i.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.desc: How the Americans, once they were provoked into war, out-produced the rest of the world so quickly and by such a huge margin, including the likes of General Motors.

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: A documentary series that gives a historical account of the events of World War II, from its roots in the 1920s to the aftermath and the lives it profoundly influenced.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return to Burghley House near Stamford and Abbotsford in Melrose for previously unscreened finds. Among the objects discussed are a jewel box made for, yet never given to, a royal princess, and the oldest walking stick seen on the programme. Plus, the owner of a Chinese watercolour receives a staggering valuation.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A sheriffs ring of office, a wooden shoe collection and a painting found under a bed show up at Chester Cathedral.

programme.desc: Paul heads out to collect a 1971 Jaguar E-Type and a 1933 Morgan three-wheeler Supersport. Before he can load up, he must negotiate a flock of chickens.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team pay a return visit to the British Museum in London, where they examine family treasures brought in by thousands of visitors. Amongst the pieces under scrutiny are dozens of historic finds dug up by mudlarkers working on the banks of the Thames, a Roman pot which turns out to be the work of Victorian con-men, and a collection of unseen images of a young Elvis comes to light.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: On the last leg of his 300-mile journey across the north and the Midlands, Robbie Cumming faces issues with ice on the Grand Union Canal, he takes on Foxtons famous lock flight in Leicestershire and completes his journey in the picturesque village Braunston, Northamptonshire, regarded as the spiritual home for narrowboaters.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Life on-board a narrowboat with Robbie Cumming. Robbie tackles a propeller problem and tricky locks on the Trent and Mersey Canal in Derbyshire.

programme.desc: Starting at the spectacular Giants Causeway in Northern Ireland, Simon travels down the east coast to the great and rapidly changing cities of Belfast and Dublin. He ends his journey in the stunning Wicklow Mountains.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos exploration of the West Country continues in south Devon. Guided by his 1930s Bradshaws, Michael arrives in Paignton to investigate an extraordinarily high murder rate in the literature of the 1930s. The Dartmouth Steam Railway conveys him in style to the beautiful home of Agatha Christie, in the company of her great-grandson, James Prichard.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo crosses the county line from Devon into Somerset on his rail exploration of the West Country steered by his 1930s Bradshaws guide. He sees first-hand how willow farmers sought to overcome the challenge from the production of synthetic plastics during the 1930s. He hears how tourism for all budgets spread across the region.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Beginning in Canterbury in Kent, Michael treads the boards as he uncovers the political message behind a play, published in 1936, inspired by the 12th century murder of Archbishop Thomas a Becket. In Maidstone, he learns of the international origins of the most British symbol of remembrance before paying his respects at a war memorial based on Londons Cenotaph.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Following his 1936 Bradshaws guidebook, Michael Portillo explores the east of England, in London and Essex, en route to Lincolnshire.On this leg, he alights at Limehouse in East London for Cable Street, which became the focus of Britains fight against fascism in the 1930s. Heading east, he arrives in Dagenham, the location of one of Henry Fords first car factories in the UK.

The arrival of a painting of a female spy from World War One triggers the discovery of an important painting.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A second visit to the Old Royal Naval College in Greenwich as the team of experts is kept busy by a huge crowd of visitors eager to learn more about their treasures.
